name: Rudum Bare
description:
PRE L;DR : TALK TO PEOPLE, CLICK ON OPTIONS, MAKE SURE NO ONE VOTES ONE ROOM.

Rudum Bare is a game in which you have to change the course of history and change the theme from One Room to something actually good.

It's pronouned Baray.

Infiltrate the elusive Royal Academy of Mediocre Games and convince people to vote for something that isn't One Room.

This would have been Rude Bear 14 (Rude Bear RPG 2) but the theme killed off that idea, then I got wasted all weekend at Insomnia so I had to rush together a game from 1pm on Monday onwards in between buying some clothes and sorting out some contract stuff.

So.. this isn't going to be a great entry roflmao.

MUSIC BY @ATMOSPHERIUM
EVERYTHING ELSE BY @ALEXROSEGAMES

========

Controls:
WASD/UDLR (and azerty/dvorak equivalents) to move (or even a controller although the choices don't work on a controller so whatever).

Click = Choose an option
